mapper.sql: COUPON_HISTORY.ID COUPONHISTORY_ID, COUPON_HISTORY.COUPON_ID COUPONHISTORY_COUPONID, COUPON_HISTORY.CHARGE COUPONHISTORY_CHARGE, COUPON_HISTORY.LAST_MODIFY_TIME COUPONHISTORY_LASTMODIFYTIME, COUPON_HISTORY.CREATE_TIME COUPONHISTORY_CREATETIME, COUPON_HISTORY.DELETED COUPONHISTORY_DELETED
mapper.insert:
insert into COUPON_HISTORY
COUPON_ID,
CHARGE,
LAST_MODIFY_TIME,
CREATE_TIME,
DELETED,
#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update:
update COUPON_HISTORY
COUPON_ID = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CHARGE = #{charge,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
LAST_MODIFY_TIME = #{lastModifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETED = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select count(ID) from COUPON_HISTORY where DELETED = 0
